Hitchhiking: The boys stood on the R-256 highway and caught a passing car. Maybe someone is looking for?

01 Nov 2019, 17:59

Hitchhiking: The boys stood on the R-256 highway and caught a passing car. Maybe someone is looking for?
17:59 11/01/2019 0
Children vote on the track.
In the group Courier.Sreda.Berdsk on Instagram wrote a subscriber:
Today at 13.30 two boys voted near the station in the direction of Novosibirsk. Suddenly, one of the parents is looking.
